players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Bob: "I agree with Diana's sentiment. Let's all be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game, especially since we have lost a member already."
You: "I will remain silent tonight as well. Let's see what happens next."

Bob: "I believe it's important that we all remain vigilant and work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death. Let's continue to keep an eye on each other and communicate openly during the day."

Diana: "I think it's important that we all share any suspicious observations or suspicions we may have, in order to help uncover the truth behind Charlie's death. Let's work together and communicate openly during both day and night."
